mapper.sql: select t.client_id, t.record_techtransfer_sid, t.record_techtransfer_code, t.sample_sid, t.sku_sid, t.techtransfer_result, t.is_sample_cq, t.is_sample_test, t.principal, t.complete_date, t.check_result_kfy, t.check_solution_kfy, t.model_process_desc, t.conclusion, t.exposure_rating_comment, t.remark, t.handle_status, t.creator_account, t.create_date, t.updater_account, t.update_date, t.confirmer_account, t.confirm_date, t.data_source_sys, t1.sample_code_self, t1.material_code, t1.material_name, t1.picture_path, t1.material_type, t1.product_season_sid, t1.material_class_sid, t1.designer_account, t1.model_sid, t1.up_down_suit, t1.sample_code_vendor, t1.customer_sid, t1.customer_product_code, t1.sample_code_customer, t1.simple_code, t1.company_sid, t1.company_brand_sid, t1.unit_base, t1.vendor_sid, t1.customer_brand_sid, t2.sku_name, t3.name as material_type_name, t4.product_season_name, t5.node_name, t6.nick_name as designer_account_name, t7.model_name, t8.customer_name, t9.company_name, t10.brand_name as company_brand_name, t11.name as unit_base_name, t12.nick_name as creator_account_name, t13.nick_name as updater_account_name, t14.nick_name as confirmer_account_name, t15.vendor_name, t16.brand_name as customer_brand_name, t17.nick_name as principal_name, t18.approval_node, t18.approval_user_id, t18.approval_user_name, t18.create_date as submit_date, t19.nick_name as submit_user_name from s_tec_record_techtransfer t LEFT JOIN s_bas_material t1 ON t1.material_sid = t.sample_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_sku t2 ON t2.sku_sid = t.sku_sid LEFT JOIN s_con_material_type t3 ON t3.code = t1.material_type LEFT JOIN s_bas_product_season t4 ON t4.product_season_sid = t1.product_season_sid LEFT JOIN s_con_material_class t5 ON t5.material_class_sid = t1.material_class_sid LEFT JOIN sys_user t6 ON t6.user_name = t1.designer_account LEFT JOIN s_tec_model t7 ON t7.model_sid = t1.model_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_customer t8 ON t8.customer_sid = t1.customer_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_company t9 ON t9.company_sid = t1.company_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_company_brand t10 ON t10.company_brand_sid = t1.company_brand_sid LEFT JOIN s_con_measure_unit t11 ON t11.code = t1.unit_base LEFT JOIN sys_user t12 ON t12.user_name = t.creator_account LEFT JOIN sys_user t13 ON t13.user_name = t.updater_account LEFT JOIN sys_user t14 ON t14.user_name = t.confirmer_account LEFT JOIN s_bas_vendor t15 ON t15.vendor_sid = t1.vendor_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_customer_brand t16 ON t16.customer_brand_sid = t1.customer_brand_sid LEFT JOIN sys_user t17 ON t17.user_name = t.principal LEFT JOIN s_sys_form_process t18 ON t18.form_id = t.record_techtransfer_sid LEFT JOIN sys_user t19 ON t19.user_id = t18.create_by_id
mapper.select:
and (t.client_id like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and t.record_techtransfer_code like concat('%',#{recordTechtransferCode}, '%')
and t.record_techtransfer_sid in (#{recordTechtransferSid})
and t.record_techtransfer_sid =#{recordTechtransferSid}
and (t1.material_code like concat('%', #{materialCode}, '%'))
and (t1.material_name like concat('%', #{materialName}, '%'))
and (t1.simple_code like concat('%', #{simpleCode}, '%'))
and t.sku_sid = #{skuSid}
and t1.product_season_sid in ( #{productSeasonSid})
and ( t1.sample_code_customer like concat('%', #{sampleCodeCustomer}, '%'))
and t1.customer_sid in (#{customerSid})
and t1.material_type in (#{materialType})
and ( t1.sample_code_self like concat('%', #{sampleCodeSelf}, '%'))
and t.sample_sid =#{sampleSid}
and t.techtransfer_result = #{techtransferResult}
and (t.is_sample_cq like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and (t.is_sample_test like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and (t.principal like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and t.complete_date = #{completeDate}
and (t.check_result_kfy like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and (t.check_solution_kfy like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and (t.model_process_desc like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and (t.conclusion like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and ( t.exposure_rating_comment like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and (t.handle_status like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and (t.creator_account like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and t.creator_account in ( #{creatorAccount})
and date_format(t.create_date,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{beginTime},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(t.create_date,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{endTime},'%y%m%d')
and (t.updater_account like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and t.update_date = #{updateDate}
and (t.confirmer_account like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and t.confirm_date = #{confirmDate}
and (t.data_source_sys like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
${params.dataScope}
order by t.record_techtransfer_code desc, t.create_date desc
mapper.insert:
insert into s_tec_record_techtransfer
client_id, record_techtransfer_sid, record_techtransfer_code, sample_sid, sku_sid, techtransfer_result, is_sample_cq, is_sample_test, principal, complete_date, check_result_kfy, check_solution_kfy, model_process_desc, conclusion, exposure_rating_comment, remark, handle_status, creator_account, create_date, updater_account, update_date, confirmer_account, confirm_date, data_source_sys,
values
#{item.clientId}, #{item.recordTechtransferCode}, #{item.sampleSid}, #{item.skuSid}, #{item.techtransferResult}, #{item.isSampleCq}, #{item.isSampleTest}, #{item.principal}, #{item.completeDate}, #{item.checkResultKfy}, #{item.checkSolutionKfy}, #{item.modelProcessDesc}, #{item.conclusion}, #{item.exposureRatingComment}, #{item.remark}, #{item.handleStatus}, #{item.creatorAccount}, #{item.createDate}, #{item.updaterAccount}, #{item.updateDate}, #{item.confirmerAccount}, #{item.confirmDate}, #{item.dataSourceSys},
